div.head: Finding a library to reach a manuscript
div.p: Use the Browse or Search functions to â€˜enter' a library (see the relevant search page: Finding manuscripts)

xmt:uList.item: In the Browse section click on the relevant country, then the city, and you will be shown a list of libraries in that city.
In the Search section use the drop-down menus to find the relevant city and then select the required library from the next drop down menu.

div.head: Finding contact information for a library
div.p: In any display showing the library name (e.g. search results, browse, image-viewer) you can get to the library contact details by clicking on the name of the library.
Alternatively you can go to the complete library list here.
